Tucson Prime understood what was happening. He did not like it but he under=
stood why Rodimus had to send him away.  This made him overheat with anger =
as he makes it perfectly clear to Jhiaxus and the others that he was not ab=
out to take any of their scrap parked in an idol position!  Yet, he does as=
 instructed and is lead to Perceptor via his thermal sensory board.  Night =
Shift helps him to navigate through the tunnels as they quickly reach Perce=
ptor.  Night Shift flings open his left door to allow Perceptor to ride in =
his cab.

"C'mon, you did help us, now it's our turn ta return that favor. =
We're gettn' outa here, but we ain't gonna leave ya down here."

Tucson Pri=
me helps to gently put Windlord and Nightlight inside Night Shift's back se=
ats.

" We'll do as Rodimus says.  Everyone gets out, even you Perceptor.  =
Night Shift is right, you helped us, now we help you.  Nightshift, get into=
 my trailer once everyone is aboard.  I have a feeling that the ride will b=
e rough and I am more equipped to deal with rough roads than you are."

Nig=
ht Shift replies.

"Umm, hey, I got four wheel drive too, no sweat."

Tucso=
n sighs.

" I know but this may be more than your system can handle.  I don=
't want to risk anyone's saftey over something that could have been prevent=
ed. Now, as soon as we're all out safely, Night Shift, you take Windlord, N=
ightlight and Perceptor and make a B line for the Ark. I'll remain behind."=


Night Shift knew there wasn't anything Tucson Prime could do.

" Uh, uh, =
I think Rodimus told ya to go back for a good reason Sir.  Maybe it's time,=
 ya know?  New era, new Prime?  You're it now Tucson Prime, you're gonna be=
 our new hope for a better future.  And you're already don' that.  Ohh yeah=
, you're gonna be a legend, and I think Rodimus knows it."

Tucson Prime pa=
uses for a moment, and then understands what Night Shift was telling him.

=
" I just didn't think it would happen this soon Night Shift.  You're right.=
  We'll all leave together and get everyone back to the Ark."

In another p=
art of the tunnel system, Quick Stride, who was full of determination to ge=
t at Deepstryke and the other seekers, falls for the lure, as Rat Trap trie=
s desperately to go after him.

" Wait, I smell a rat, and it's not me!  Do=
n't fall for it Quickstride!  IT'S A TRAP!  UGHHH THAT STUPID HORSE!"
